QAPair.Question: What is (are) Asthma - what to ask the doctor - adult ?
QAPair.Answer: Asthma is a problem with the lung airways. A person with asthma may not feel symptoms all the time. But when an asthma attack happens, it becomes hard for air to pass through your airways. The symptoms are usually: Coughing, Wheezing, Chest tightness, Shortness of breath , In rare cases, asthma causes chest pain. Below are some questions you may want to ask your health care provider to help you take care of your asthma.
